titles.title: Home Office Simplification Act of 2005
To provide a standard deduction for business use of a home.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/9/2005--Introduced. Home Office Simplification Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a standard minimum tax deduction of $2,500 for business use of a residence.
